projectAuthor: Philippine Science High School Main Campus
projectDesc: Accelerometers are used to determine the direction of gravity, and can be used to determine the orientation of devices. By orienting the accelerometer in different positions of known slopes, the concept of vectors can be visualized more clearly.

projectAuthor: Philippine Science High School Main Campus
projectDesc: Surface color is determined by the amount of light reflected off a surface. This circuit should return relative red, green, and blue light levels reflected off an area.

projectAuthor: Philippine Science High School Main Campus
projectDesc: Use sound to determine the distance of various objects from the ultrasonic sensor. This is the same system used in automobiles to avoid collisions.
A simulation of an automatic air-conditioning system using a light-emitting diode (LED) and a temperature sensor.

projectTitle: Automatic Illumination Control using a Light Dependent Resistor
projectDesc: A simulation of an automatic illumination control system modelled with a light-emitting diode (LED) and a light dependent resistor (LDR).

projectDesc: A simple GPS setup can be used to determine location, altitude, velocity, date and time, as well as record a GPS track.

projectDesc: Create a remotely operated device that translates user inputs to potentiometers into motion.

projectDesc: Create a remotely operated device that could be manipulated via a web browser.

projectDesc: Use the accelerometer to determine how level a surface really is. This is also a good place to discuss the limitations of an accelerometer with regards to rotational information.
